briefdescription.para: Encode Frame instance into a string.
Convert a string into a Frame instance.
Execute the command based on the command key and the parameter.
Send event register value to the ground station.

simplesect.para: This function is called in the main loop

memberdef.argsstring: (ExecutionResult result, uint8_t group, uint8_t command, const std::string &value, const ValueUnit unitType)
memberdef.name: buildFrame
